name: Toy Mania Cubes Blast
description:
Toy Mania Blast Match is a beautiful match 3 game of toy blocks! Hundreds of fun levels are free to play in this epic toy wonderland.
Beautiful artwork will make you fully entertained while solving puzzles.
Download free and have a try!
Play with your families & friends via Facebook.

GAME FEATURES:
- Hundreds well-designed levels!
- Top-1 tier graphics, amazing effects and animation!
- Travel in the amazing fairy world with various themes as you play!
- Complete different targets to win the level before you run out of moves!
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to finish all levels!
- Take on your friends to compete for the best score and see who can switch their way to the fattest onions ever!
- Rechargeable boosters, extra moves and special power-ups to help with those challenging levels!
- Play without an Internet connection!
- Connect Facebook as you will and get free coins to invite your friends!

Toy Mania Blast Match is a fun match-3 puzzle game for all ages which will delight you with colourful effects and interesting puzzles. Match by three or more to make them disappear.
The game's mechanics are similar to those of games like Toy Blast, Farm Heroes Saga and cookie jam.
Multiple levels, locations and interesting mechanics are sure to keep you entertained.

Toy Mania Blast Match is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Play Toy Mania Blast Match today and join millions enjoying the latest touch craze!
